phrs.translation: 决定退出；插播；请求免除
决定不参加...；决定（从...）退出

sentences.sentence: Anyone who opts to go on Alaska Mean River Time will live in harmony with the planet.
sentences.translation: 任何选择阿拉斯加平均河流时间的人都将与地球和谐相处。

sentences.sentence: Health Columnist Opts For Sinus surgery.
sentences.translation: 健康专栏作家对于鼻窦手术的看法。

sentences.sentence: To see the current EMSRV working directory, issue the emadmin opts command.
sentences.translation: 要查看当前EMSRV工作目录，请发出emadmin opts command。
